rooms.description: Entrance area with open space for visitors, designed to allow positive energy flow.
Spacious living room that opens to the central courtyard, promoting natural ventilation and ample daylight.
Dining area adjacent to the living room, facilitating a comfortable dining experience with natural light.
Modern kitchen designed with efficient workflow and proper ventilation to maintain balance as per Vastu principles.
Master bedroom with private bathroom, ensuring privacy and calm atmosphere.
Secondary bedroom designed for family members with adjoining balcony overlooking the courtyard.
Functional bathroom attached to master bedroom ensuring efficient water flow.
Additional bedroom with space for personal belongings and storage.
Modern library integrated into the villa design, fostering knowledge and calm, strategically placed near a window for natural light.
